EmailTemplate.name: SFDC2: Opp 72h Reminder Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: 72 h SLA - {!Opportunity.Name} - {!Opportunity.CI_Projected_Close_Date__c} Boarding Form Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Reminder: 72 h SLA. Please note {!Opportunity.Name} has a Projected Close Date of {!Opportunity.CI_Projected_Close_Date__c} and the Boarding Form has not been submitted for review.
